name: Slime Run (Kenura)
description:
Maximum Monster Month Game Jam Entry

Help the tiny Slime Boy escape from the Wizards Castle. Jump, Fall, and Slime your way to victory.

The game is an endless runner, this game is an entry for the Maximum Monster Month Game Jam. The Game is more so a simple endless runner, and just has you moving right with some wall jumps, and platforms you can drop through.

Controls:

Up and Down Arrow = Move Options in Menu
Enter = Select in Menu
Space = Start Running and to Jump
Down Arrow = To Fall Through Platforms
H = Return to Menu
R = To Restart

You can Jump on Enemies to Kill Them.
